metadata.title: CVE-2021-29279 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: There is a integer overflow in functionfilter_core/filter_props.c:gf_props_assign_value in GPAC 1.0.1. In which,the arg const GF_PropertyValue *value,maybe value->value.data.size is anegative number. In result, memcpy in gf_props_assign_value failed.

criterions.comment: gpac package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
